[center][size=3]My first mod using creation kit from watching and reading tutorials for a few weeks. I'm still learning but thought I would share my work even if it sucks. I included a short video of her in action. Enjoy and if you like hit the endorse button to say thank you. You will find Adreana in Falkreath in Dead Mans Drink.[/size]

[size=3]> Non Essential and marriagable

> Race-Wood Elf

> Armor-Custom armor (Included)

> Custom Elven Bow (Included)
